website_summaries.verdict: All the benefits of a metal tag without the noise that you typically find when the animal moves.
pros: Uses an exterior cover that fits around the edge of the tag, which keeps noise to a minimum
Tag has a stainless steel construction with a polished mirror finish
Laser printing method ensures the text will remain visible over time
Pick 4 lines of text per side
cons: Thin design in the tag's materials may not stand up to stress from the animal

customer_reviews.title: Beware! CHEAPLY MADE! Not durable!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give 0 stars. These are not worth what you pay for them. They’re the cheapest most crappy tags I’ve ever seen in my life. Even the ones you make in the machine yourself are better than this. After under a week of wear, it’s all scratched and the ring is all bent. I’m glad it didn’t poke my dog in the throat. Don’t buy! Don’t waste your money on this! It’s not durable whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "attitude" tags
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered this tag when we adopted an old man dog that thought it was fun to headbutt the gate until it opened so he could wander the 'hood. The main reason I chose this tag is the fact it glows in the dark. The sarcastic sayings on the other side of the name/phone number side is pure bonus. I love that I can match the tag colors to the collars. The only thing I don't like is that the glow-in-the-dark silencer ring pops off the tag from time to time. I may need to just super glue it on.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my now my 3rd purchase from GoTags and all 3 have turned out perfectly! I foster pitbulls and these tags are inexpensive enough for me to get each foster his or her own. The silencer is also an awesome addition! It keeps my pups tags quiet and the fact that it's glow in the dark is just an extra bonus. I'm very happy with my purchases so far and will continue to use GoTags for my fosters!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanee

customer_reviews.title: I really like the glow in the dark rubber piece around the ...
customer_reviews.text: Since this is a custom item they gave it extra time, however I received this well ahead of when it was originally scheduled to arrive. Although we haven't had the tag very long on our dog's collar, I can already tell it will last longer than the last one we had, which was not made by GoTags. I really like the glow in the dark rubber piece around the metal tag, as I think it will not allow the metal to wear through which is how the last one broke. I will definitely order from GoTags again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Bargain tags
customer_reviews.text: These heart shaped metallic tags with "silencer" are a great deal. I got one pink and one purple from the Chewy website, and when I realized I made a typo, I purchased the replacement via Amazon. Depending on the light source and viewing angle, the pink tag can look red and the purple tag can look pink. Before adding the tags to my furbabies' collars, right out of the package the silencers do glow green if it's in complete darkness. Using the typo tag, I did try to scratch the white laser engraving with my fingernail and couldn't do it. For the price these tags are a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, quiet doggy tags.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my two small pups. I liked that the tags were surrounded by silicone so that they wouldn’t jingle. The tags were exactly as I ordered. I blacked out my address on the photo for obvious reasons. Even though the pups are always supervised, and microchipped, I like having the extra security of tags for them. These are nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hollybrook

customer_reviews.title: Great tag for your pet
customer_reviews.text: My dog lost the first one from his collar so this is my second order. The tag came exactly as ordered. I will continue to use this company. The tags are nicely done and the silencer works well. I wish there was a better way to secure these (as well as rabies tags). Those small wire things that you attach to the collar come off easily. (This company just makes the tags.)
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Our dog likes to chew his tags so keep that in mind when reading this review. He was able to chew the glow tag off immediately which really didn't fit that well to begin with. It was not a bright glow, but did light up a little. His tag after 3 days had to be replaced. These are very thin and easy to bend. It was bend immediately and eventually everything was scratched off. I gave middle of road stars because it was not horribly expensive and if you have a dog that will not chew on it, you might be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG SAID...Thanks For "TAGGING" Me !!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the round design in the blue color with 4 lines of text on just one side. Upon inspection it was perfect in every way. It could be read effortlessly with absolutely no spelling errors. It read as I intended upon ordering. The soft rim does glow if charged with light but I would not buy for that reason alone. I think the better function of the rim is to eliminate clanking noises. The rim does fit tight. All in all, I got what I paid for with no issues whatsoever along with a quality finish with respect to color and personalization.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Dog Tag
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about my Lab biting this rubber encased tag since he loves to chew on his tags. This actually stopped his behavior, because he just does not know he has it on. When he goes outside the rubber part charges in the sun so it glows in the dark. We can see him anywhere anytime. At night he sleeps with us, and also see his tag. Also the print on the metal part of the tag was large and thick print and easy to read. Quality product
customer_reviews.author: stephanie lagow

customer_reviews.title: Tags came just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The tags look great! The white lettering on black background is especially appealing to me, it is the reason I purchased these over another kind. Also the rubber protector prevents it from banging on color and rubbing the engraving off. I would have liked to purchase different colors but there were no images of the other colors with the white lettering and I did not know what they would look like. My only suggestion is to take images of all the different color combinations so the buyer can see what they look like and have in informed choice.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I like the plastic no jingle material. The lettering/numbers are good and easily readable BUT... They sent a split ring that is WAAY TOO SMALL...it could not be used since it could not be split far enough to get it onto the tag. CHEAP RING deserves a poor rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tag
customer_reviews.text: These tags are just what they look like. It's nice that you can have them personalized for such a small price. The only reason for 4 stars is because the silicone silencer comes off the tag at least daily. I'm not sure how it comes off so easily, but it does. So if it's an important feature to you to not have your dogs tags clinking together this one might not be best for you. It's easy to slip it back on, but why should you have to?
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, don’t listen to poor reviews! Great dog tag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about this product when I first received it because it was thin and I thought that the rubber band around the tag which is a reflector would discolor and not work. After three years, tag looks like new! I love having the green fluorescent tag at night in the bedroom or whenever the light is off to see where the dog is. Past dog tags have left a gray mark on my dogs chest, this one does not! I am very happy with it and highly recommend it. For $10 bucks, you can afford one a year!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of the tag, but not the connecting ring
customer_reviews.text: The tag is light wt, easily readable and very practical for my dog’s collar. The tag is big and the connecting ring ( it’s about 13 mm in diameter) I felt was a tad too big to wear along with name tag. He weighs all of 8 lbs and I solved the situation by tying it on to the collar with some thin cotton rope. I feel safe having my dog properly identified with our phone number listed. The glow in the dark silicone edging was a nice cute touch.
customer_reviews.author: Christina E Jayasinghe

customer_reviews.title: Great design but I question the durability of the product.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the look and design of this tag. However, within 2 days I noticed the rubber, reflective piece had come undone and was just hanging there. I was able to put it back on the tag but felt this was not acceptable for the price and I expect this will happen again. The reflective part it very soft rubber and I assume had I not noticed it it would have eventually disappeared In the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should've ordered a darker color
customer_reviews.text: I should've ordered the purple instead of the silver. U can read it, but the lettering doesn't stand out that well. Especially on a white dog. The tag doesn't stand out that well either. However, it is a really nice tag overall. The silencer glows in the dark which is FANTASTIC! My son loves thag fact. Lol. Will order again in the future if needed. Still wish I would've ordered the purple or a darker color so it was easier to see and read.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and the text was correct. The rubber guard encases the edges and hopefully will keep the text from wearing off since its not engraved but printed. I'll update later if its last or fails. But as is its worth the price especially for a pet thats indoors and won't be playing in the woods as much as mine will. Thats why the last tag from a different seller ended up a textless scratch covered mess.
customer_reviews.author: TimeKiller

customer_reviews.title: Great Tags!
customer_reviews.text: Tag arrived ahead of time and was exactly as described. The lettering was very clear and easy to read. Had ordered stainless steel tags from another seller in the past and they were difficult to read and the engraving became faint and harder to read over time. Love the protector around this tag - it also helps with the noise of the tags hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Frosti

customer_reviews.title: Best tags I've found
customer_reviews.text: The tag itself is fantastic. The metal is sturdy and will not bend easily. The lettering is perfect and easy to read. I appreciate the "free" silencing piece of silicone (?) to go around the tags but it is too big and is always falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gold, which is more of a copper, and not a true gold. The glow in the dark silencer comes off REALLY easily, I adjust it daily (my dogs wrestle constantly, so if you have one dog, or ones that don't think they're in the WWE, it may stay on better). The glow in the dark is SO NICE though, especially on the black dog that can't be seen in the dark. They are really cute, though, and now my girls match, so you can tell they're sisters. :)
customer_reviews.author: Soma Pradhan

customer_reviews.title: Shallow engraving and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The engraving is very shallow, more of an etching that scratches off easily. More importantly, the entire tag is made from cheap stamped metal with thin layer of color which scratches easily. I thought I would love the silicon bumper but that lasted only a few days. The tags look great in photos but once they’re on real dogs in real life, poor quality is revealed quickly. Outreach to the company only got attitude in response.
customer_reviews.author: rockytop

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in February and it is already almost unusable by the end of April. The silencer is tearing and about to fall off, and one side of the tag is so dented and scratched that our address cannot be read. My dog is almost 10 years old so he is not exceptionally hard on this product. I am disappointed that I wasted $9.00 on this. His last tag lasted many years until we moved and needed to change the address. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: G Rich

customer_reviews.title: What's important to know about this product ?
customer_reviews.text: What's most important to know about this doggie nametag is, is it a good value for its price ? Well, it is easy to read, it reflects light at night so it's easily seen, it seems durable and its cost appears reasonable to us. All boxes checked off - I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a reasonable way to identify your dog safely and in an affordable manner.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice tags for a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I like these tags for a couple reasons: the glow-in-the-dark rubber edging on the tag makes the tags stand out and also protects the tag itself. I ordered the red and purple for my 2 dogs; both colors are bright and show well. Because GoTags will engrave on both sides at no extra charge, I was able to put the names on the front in bolder print, and more pertinent information on the back side - great feature! Hope these tags will wear well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for old worn down tag
customer_reviews.text: My dog has licked his old tag so much against the hardwood floors that it has basically turned into a shiv. See pic of the old tag that I had used for 6.5 years. I got the new tag as a replacement because of its silencer trim. It glows in the dark and Teddy no longer licks it against the floors. I recommend for anyone looking for an affordable dog tag with a silent trim.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Good idea and looked decent for the 5 minutes that I had it....
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was ok, but compared to the one I made at the pet store, I can't say it was worth the price here. I loved the idea of the glow-in-the-dark tag silencer. It was nice while it lasted, but I will say that the glow-in-the-dark silencer was a little too big for the tag. I clipped it on to my dog's harness and he chewed it within minutes. The rubber silencer was destroyed and the tag itself is riddled with bite marks. What's odd is that he's never attempted to do that to the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ID tag for my dog that hates tags. I got the rubber edging to keep the rabies tag from clanging against the ID tag, and it worked great. But after a few months, the rubber edge wore thru, so it’s now just the ID tag and jingles when she moves. ID tag itself is great. My dog just doesn’t like the jingling noise. Yeah, she’s eccentric.
customer_reviews.author: Ozarks local

customer_reviews.title: Nicely crafted, but very small
customer_reviews.text: The name tag is very small. I have a 90 pound German Shepherd and you can barely see it on his collar. It would be greatly suited for a small dog. On the plus side, somehow the manufacturer was able to fit all of my information on the nameplate. It was very well made and the rubber edge glows in the dark. I would suggest the manufacturer make these is different sizes for different size dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tag, great! Ring for attachment, UGH!
customer_reviews.text: The ring you send with the tag (which i love in theory) is terrible. It's too small to actually get open and around the 'rubber'-like material around the outside of the engraved part. It just digs into the material. There's no way I'll be able to put this ring on the tag. I'll find something to use, but it's a pain in the a**.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K

customer_reviews.title: Silencer falls off.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber edge does not stay around the bone for very long. It is not snug enough to stay on. This is disappointing as they are sold as a set. The tag itself is good quality and arrived in a timely fashion. I would recommend buying engraved tags from GoTags, but NOT the rubber silencers. I will attempt to super glue the silencer on to see if that keeps it in place.
customer_reviews.author: CouBou

customer_reviews.title: Great tags for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dog bones which are on the larger size. It was great ordering the tags with the silencers. It's cheaper than driving to a store that let's you make your own tags. Ordered 2 different colors and everything came printed correctly. My kids love that they glow in dark. My dogs still probably wonder why we sit in the dark with them while my kids check out their tags.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the tag/silencer
customer_reviews.text: Love our new tag! We bought the tag that has the glow-in-the-dark silencer. The tag is printed clearly and easy to read... we have a long address, but everything fits nicely. The silencer is a lightweight trim for the tag... it does make the tag stop jingling when our dog walks. But best of all, I can see it in the night. Great purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate !
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the quality might be bad. No need to worry..the engraving is nice, and it was correct. The quality is nice and not too thin on the actual ID tag. Came with glow in the dark silencer that was thick and easily slips onto the tag. Great for the price. I will be buying my other pets tags now !
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Very Silent and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tag for my dog. It came quickly with all the information I added before checkout. It didn’t come with the glow in the dark silencer however. I e-mailed GoTags and they responded very quickly and sent it right out to us. It looks and works great. I’m using it between a rabies tag and the city license tag. We used an o ring to connect to the collar and one to connect all 3 tags, so they face forward. Very silent! I will purchase again from GoTags.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Pettingill

customer_reviews.title: 2nd tag for us
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd tag we bought through this company. Our Aussie was a puppy when we got the first one and she managed to chew off the glow ring around the tag but the tag lasted. She is now 2 so we decided to replace the 1st one. The glow ring is great. I recommend this company. Shipping was fast even during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Marty L.

customer_reviews.title: Secure Your Dog Tag
customer_reviews.text: The Dog tags were great. I love the size of lettering, the ability to glow in the dark and the rubber trim that kept the tag from making a clanging sound. The price was great as well. What I didn’t like was the circular clasp was not secure enough. With that being said, one dog has her tag on after using pliers to bend the clasp so that it overlapping with no room to slip off. I have to buy a replacement tag for the other dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ID Tag at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I order a green dog bone shaped personalized pet ID tag and it exceeded my expectations. The is of reasonable size for my cocker spaniel mix and has his name in the front and enough room on the back for 2 phone numbers and an address. The tag also comes with a glow in the dark silicon protector that surrounds the edges and a small key ring. The print etching was crisp and easy to read. I got this tag at fraction of the cost charged by the national pet store chains
customer_reviews.author: tomos

customer_reviews.title: Great Tag just glue to plastic rim
customer_reviews.text: Since I had read about problems with when plastic edging, I super glued the rubber edging to the tag before putting the tag on my dog’s collar. It worked great and the rubber hasn’t come off since. My dog has even had it in her mouth and can’t separate them or chew it off. Great tag. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: D J Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: It might be a little lighter than I expected, but that was because of my background choice. The text is exactly what I asked for and I had no problem getting the included attachment ring through the silencer and tag. My dogs only go outside when accompanied since we live in an apartment, so I expect this will hold up just fine with that level of wear, just like a similarly engraved tag that my older dog has worn for years.
customer_reviews.author: ~heavv~

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These acme quickly. They are easy to read and the bumper around the edge makes them silent when rubbing against the other tags. I haven’t noticed the glow in the dark being particularly bright but that might just be my lazy dogs not being in the sun enough to completely charge them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great name tags!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that the noise reducing cover that goes around the name tag would glow in the dark! Great feature! My only problem is that my dogs wrestle a lot so I frequently need to put the cover back on the tag, but otherwise, I'm really happy with these tags!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality "silent" tag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tags for my two Cocker spaniels. The tags had plenty of room for all the information i wanted to include, using both sides of the tag. I especially like the "silencer" feature. My husband doesn't notice, but the constant metallic clinking from other tags drives me crazy. The tags also came quickly and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Bean

customer_reviews.title: Love the Glow in the Dark feature
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new puppy and the glow at night rubber cover on the tag is perfect. We can see where she is at night. Game changer. My only issue is that the rubber frame on the tag comes off once in awhile, especially when we are playing. Other than that, a nice lightweight tag. Engravement was perfect and easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: sue perkins

customer_reviews.title: Glow in dark feature not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Within 24 hours, the rubber framing with the glow in the dark feature dislodged from the tag. I fix it and within a short time it has come off again. Not worth the feature which is what attracted me to this particular tag. Have no idea how long the lettering on the metal tag will last but not that hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: colette

customer_reviews.title: They Messed It Up
customer_reviews.text: They did not print it as I requested. I wanted my puppy’s name on the front and the rest of the info on the back but they squeezed it all on the front which now is too crammed to clearly read. Will probably order another one (from a different company).
customer_reviews.author: carol e.

customer_reviews.title: this pet ID looks great. The soft rubber border helps keep the rattle ...
customer_reviews.text: When new, this pet ID looks great. The soft rubber border helps keep the rattle of multiple tags down. Now the downside: the soft rubber border tears easy if snagged on anything and if there a multiple tags (rabies, license) the laser print becomes totally unreadable due to the rubbing of the tags. Due to this, I will have to find a new tag. Because of this, I would not recommend this pet ID.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good experience. I had ordered two tags. They caught a difference in the phone numbers and contacted me to verify before sent. Pretty important tupo I made and they caught. The only thing I would do different is order a darker tag (instead of silver), so the etching stands out better. But that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: savegreys

customer_reviews.title: Cute tags that glow!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought three of these tags so far. The first one got scratched up and the plastic glow in the dark silencer was torn after a fun weekend of playing with his litter mate. One month ago we adopted his mother so needed a new tag. I went ahead and reordered a replacement for the torn scratched one. I think they’re very cute and I love that they glow. Priced good enough for me to replace if they get messed up again, but that only happened due to excessive bitey face games.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality product!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived before expected, the glow in the dark silencer is awesome, and despite other reviews saying they didn't fit right, mine are great! I have two black labs so any kind of reflective anything is always a plus for me!The lettering is bright and easily read, everything is just like I typed it! They enclosed a 10 percent off coupon, which I will be using when I order the personalized collars! So happy with the quality of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahgc

customer_reviews.title: Product misrepresentation. No silencer.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tag because it came with the silencer. It came with only the tag. If the seller fixes this, I will adjust the review. If not, one star stays and I will be requesting a refund.i specifically bought this tag because of the silencer so the lettering doesn't wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Rubber silencer does not work
customer_reviews.text: The rubber silencer does not stay on, it falls to the side rendering it useless. Had to finally cut it off the tag because it caught on something and tore. Then the edges of the tag cut my dogs ears so i had to throw it out. Nice concept, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: JDS2525

customer_reviews.title: Dog Chewed Silicon & Make Tag Unreadable
customer_reviews.text: I loved how quiet this tag was while it lasted. My dog's collar is not snug on his neck, and he was able to reach & chew the silicon on the edge of the tag, in the process scratching and denting the tag itself so that it became unreadable. Not a viable choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: JudyinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Glow/sound reducer comes off...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, nicely and correctly engraved. Two problems: 1) Very hard to get the tag with the plastic around it onto the collar ring, and more importantly, 2) now that it is on it is hanging in two separate pieces; it still glows, however is not working as advertised. Disappointed. I'll probably be looking to purchase another product soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great , good quality
customer_reviews.text: The tags I ordered were not delivered to me. So I contacted the seller and they were wonderful. Prompt and efficient. They re-sent the tag and it arrived in no time. It’s now on my dogs collar. Looks great. I would order tags from them Again
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very light-weight tag and the border prevents ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light-weight tag and the border prevents any noise that might cause alarm while eating, playing, etc. I just can't understand why the tag would have the hanger mounted on the short edge of the rectangular tag, causing it to hang vertically.. This hangs down quite far for a short dog. In my mind, the hanger should have been attached to the long edge of the tag, thereby allowing the tag to hang horizontally, as shown in the picture labeled "Scout". I will look for something else to use as it really gets in my dog's way and he tries to pull it off the collar. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. King

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These little tags are well made, come in a such a huge variety of shapes and colors there's something to please everyone, and I love the flexible ring that comes to place around the tag which both keeps it from jingling and is fluorescent so it shines in the dark if it's been in the light. Delivery was fast, too! And did I mention how reasonably priced they are? :)
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ma'ly

customer_reviews.title: Great tag but you may want to choose a colored background
customer_reviews.text: Love the tag - big enough and the silencer on it makes it so my dog doesn't jingle with every step. I bought the silver color and the engraving isn't the easiest to read. I bought the silver because a blue background from a previous color scratched off over time and you couldn't read it. I just didn't think about the fact that with the words being etched in that they would be so similar. If/when I have to replace I would definitely buy one from GoTags again, I would just pick a colored background.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get it on the ring.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of it, but I have not been able to get it on the enclosed ring, since I cannot spread the ring wide enough to get the tag on it. When I have more time (now, after the holidays), I will see if I can buy a different size ring.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Holihan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with how these (3) engraved dog tags turned out. Very easy to read, good quality, and plenty of room on the front for name & phone number, and more room on back for chip ID #. PERFECT!! I would definitely recommend this to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service! Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the silver round tag for my cat Halley recently. Before it shipped, I realized that the bell on her collar was a lighter gold and not silver. I messaged the seller to see if the order could be changed to gold. I soon got a notification that it had shipped and I assumed that it was too late and that I should settle for the silver. It came before the estimated date and Halley wore it for a handful of days before a gold one showed up in my mail! The glow in the dark band is awesome too! I'm so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Marinaccio

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I made a spelling error on my own order, and they were nice enough to replace it for me! Tag is a great size, the color is bright, and the glow-in-the-dark silencer is a wonderful feature. No more late night jingling when my dog moves around. Fast shipping, and the packaging is very clever too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great glow in the dark feature.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Nice not to hear the jingling when the dogs are walking (I’m sure they appreciate it even more than I do). The glow in the dark feature is nice and bright! I can tell them apart in total darkness by the different shape of their tags!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Kotecki

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Engravings were easy to read and look like they will hold up well. The dogs have been wearing them for a few weeks and so far there are no chips or scratches. The glowing bumper glows for a surprisingly long time. This is great for night-time walks, but somewhat disconcerting when you wake up at 1 am and see a small glowing shape at the end of your bed (though this is a compromise I am happy to make).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Delivered very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that it would take along time time for this to be made and delivered but it actually took a week less than the seller said it would. The quality is great and it is really neat that the silencer glows in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Better Ordering Web Site.
customer_reviews.text: The tags are what I expected and are good quality. I would like to see a friendlier ordering site. I placed an order for one tag and wanted to change something, but I couldn't go back and see what I had ordered....if that makes sense. It would be helpful if there was a final picture of the tag and the inscriptions for review before ordering. I say this because the tag I ordered for my boy "Baxter" came with my other dog's name on it.. So I had to reorder an entirely new tag for him. Not seeing it before I ordered it made it hard for me to remember which tag in my basket said what...
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Van Bebber

customer_reviews.title: NOT for CATS - TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: These were listed as being for dogs & cats. I ordered for my 2 cats. They are way too large for cats. I reluctantly used one of them because I was going out of town & needed to have a tag on a new cat. The tag and collar came off and was lost within 2 hours. The tags look nice, but not for cats.I believe the large size is bound to get hung up on things (branches, fencing, etc.) Fortunately, he was wearing a breakaway collar which he has worn for months with no tag.
customer_reviews.author: Pam in TX

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one of these with our dogs name on one side and his "full" name and address on the other side. It was actually delivered quicker than the expected time and love the glow in the dark silencer ring around the tag. Will definitely be ordering additional tags.
customer_reviews.author: Roadglide33

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these - one in blue and one in pink for my dogs. They arrived much quicker than I expected. The quality is good. Their name and my contact information is very easy to read. The best part is the glow in the dark piece. It is not super bright, but I can see it.
customer_reviews.author: jclous1998

customer_reviews.title: Great tags!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tags. If you don’t have too much lettering they will be etched in a bigger font. Some other products have the lettering just stamped on and this one is etched in. It’s very clear to read and lasts forever. The rubber guard to put around the tag Glows in the dark, as well as protecting the tag and keeping it from clanging. Great seller. Product arrived surprisingly quick for being a personalized item.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two pink heart shaped dog tags. The silencer is a great improvement to the noise dog tags makes. The engraving is well done and very clear to read. We put our dog's names on one side and our contact information on the other side. Very impressed with the quality and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TXFan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.  Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tag to replace my dog's old tag, which fell off. Looks great, and the silencing ring is nice because it glows in the dark and protects the engraving a bit. The split ring which is included seems to be sturdy, too, unlike some of the other tags I've bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: yetisaurus

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: My pup is too small & needed a tiny tag, but he will be using this one as soon as he's big enough that he doesn't trip over it. Engraving was perfect & the included silencer is awesome. I paid more for a small tag & separate silencer than for this tag/silencer
customer_reviews.author: A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a tag for my dog and I am very happy with it. I love the idea of the plastic that surrounds the tag glows in the dark. The only odd thing is it did not come with a ring and it is thick so it did not fit the small ring our old tag was on. Fortunately I had a bigger ring to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Balton

customer_reviews.title: Really cute but falls off
customer_reviews.text: The font is large and easy to read but the silicone part that wraps around the metal tag slips off sooo easily. We have a 1 year old dog who plays a normal amount but she's not rolling around where the tag should be able to come off. We have to fix it at least once a day if not more. It eventually fell off somewhere in the yard and we couldn't find it :/
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with "Glow in the Dark Silencer to Protect Tag & Engraving"
customer_reviews.text: First off, the product is fine. It's a typical dog tag just like the ones you get from the machines at Petsmart, only less expensive. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because it says very clearly in the description of the product.... "includes Glow in the Dark Silencer to Protect Tag & Engraving".... I received the dog tag with the exact engraving requested on both sides.... but there was no "Glow in the Dark Silencer to Protect Tag & Engraving" included..... Semi disappointed, but overall I'm still satisfied because I still saved a buck anyways. If I could give them 3.5 stars I would based on price alone.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: The tag is great.  The silencer, however, is impossible to connect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tag and may buy more for all her harnesses until she gets micro-shipped. However, the ring to connect the tag is inadequate. You cannot get the ring through the tag and silencer without springing the ring, rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Came out great
customer_reviews.text: This tag was exactly as described. I only added text for name on the front and it was automatically blown up to fit the full width of the tag. Thanks for a great product at a reasonable price. It also came with a rubber surrounding attachment to keep multiple tags (rabies) from clinking together.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: After reviewing several options, I purchased from Go Tags for our dog Lucy
customer_reviews.text: This product came exactly as described on their Amazon listing. Our dog shakes her head a lot and the tag noise is loud. I purchased the pink heart, 3 lines and it came just as advertised. We don’t even hear her shaking her head now. I recommend this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog tag
customer_reviews.text: I love this tag we got for our dog. The letters are easy to read and I love that it glows in the dark and has a cover around it protects the tag and keeps it from making noise when our dog shakes his head. I would definitely recommend this dog tag.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Product was awesome. Was a tad disappointed the silencer covered some of the lettering on the tag. Was pleasantly surprised when my dog ran outside, then came back in with his tag glowing (mid-day). Good product for the price. ***update, changed to 3 stars because the product didn’t hold up well at all. Scratched very easily, so much so that I can hardly read my phone number on it, the rubber silencer broke off, and it looked so terrible it went in the trash. Wasted money, sadly. I really liked it at first.
customer_reviews.author: LeahMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog tabs
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly, look exactly as expected & I all was spelled perfectly. I bought the Red "rectangular" that basically shaped like a military ID tag. I love that you can put more info on these tags then usual. I would greatly use this company any of my animals' tags in future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tag!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well built tag. The silencer is nice, definitely makes a huge difference and glows quite nicely as well. The letters are big enough to read and stand out. Overall, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Looked so nice especially with the glow in the dark effects
customer_reviews.text: Looked so nice especially with the glow in the dark effects. Couldn’t wait to put it on but now wish I hadn’t because within the hour, our puppy somehow managed to chew off the rubber and even the tag is all scratched. I would give 5 stars for quality and price but right now it’s just a regular scratched up name tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was nice but didn’t last one day
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package the tag was just as described. It was a blue dog bone shape with a rubber dog bone around the edges that glows in the dark. I’ll never know if the rubber part glows in the dark because it didn’t last past sunset. My Husky has worn the tag for approximately 4 hours before it looked like a pack of wolves attacked it. I don’t know if the Husky chewed the tag or my Labrador. Either way I’m back to needing an ID for my Husky instead of just his microchip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The front side of the ID Tag was correct and easy to read. I only filled out the section for the front side, didn’t want anything on the back side. When I received the tag the back side had the phrase “Oh Sh-t I’m Lost”. I didn’t request this and find this extremely distasteful considering I didn’t order the tag this way. Why would I want my dog wearing this tag? I won’t bother returning this tag. It’s just not worth the hassle. Buyer beware! They evidently can’t follow their own instructions. If I could I would rate this product 0.
customer_reviews.author: Philly2

customer_reviews.title: Well made, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and quick delivery. Even came with a glow in the dark silencer which I was not aware of. Found out by my dog making me jump 2 feet in the air when I saw a small glowing bone about 2 feet off the ground floating in the dark kitchen... Highly recommend, will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Dog Tags
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 3 sets of these Dog Tags. The quality was good and these was very fair. They glow in the dark so you or others can see. Fast shipping and package well. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: MFSwan175

customer_reviews.title: silencer won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: We got the heart shaped tag & the silencer glows in the dark which is cool but everyday I have to put it back on the dog tag. Good thing it has a hole to attach to the collar or it would have been gone the first day.
customer_reviews.author: scs

customer_reviews.title: Love the glow-in-the-dark tags
customer_reviews.text: No more tripping over the dogs at night. These dog tags are also easy to read and make no noise. Love the product. Multiple purchases due to having changed data on tags. Will buy again, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J. Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Skip this dog tag
customer_reviews.text: When this first arrived, we were really happy with it. However, 6 weeks in, we’re pretty bummed. We have both mine and my fiancé’s phone numbers on the tag and his is scratched off almost entirely and mine is starting to be scratched off. Really disappointing for a product we haven’t had anywhere near long enough for that kind of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: The silencer comes off every day.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tags. The engraving is clear and very readable and I like that they can be engraved on both sides. The silencer comes off at least once a day and I have to pull and tug with my old arthritic fingers to put it back on. When the silencer comes off, the tag is more likely to get scratched by the other tags on the collar. If the silencer didn't come off I would have given it it a higher rating for value and durability.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My order came in before I expected it to.. The printing is actually stamped into the tag, not printed on. I ordered the glow in the dark tag silencer and a week later it's still as bright as the first day. I hope this one lasts longer than the one that I ordered from another vendor that wore through and fell off in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: quallsj

customer_reviews.title: These tags don't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: I've often bought engraved tags from other vendors for our dog. The engraving on them lasts about a year before they become scratched and unreadable from bouncing around our dog's collar and hitting the other tags. Those tags cost 2-3 times less what this tag cost, and I thought this would be a superior product with deeper engraving further protected by the rubber edging. This proved not to be the case at all. After less than a month the shallow engraving has becomes defaced and scratched, and some lines cannot be deciphered at all. It's back to the lesser expensive, longer lasting tags for us.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Telzer

customer_reviews.title: Is it really worth the Glow?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not overly impressed by these. The Glow portion won't stay to the tag on either dog. I do like the way they glowing the dark, but if they won't stay on it will defeat the purpose. I would shop around more before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great tag
customer_reviews.text: High quality tag. Arrived as ordered and described. The silencer is a perfect fit (I ordered bone shape) and keeps the name tag from making noise against her rabies tag. The silencer also glows in the dark true to the photo in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, love the glow in the dark
customer_reviews.text: The glow in the dark is awesome, it does pop off sometimes but its still great. The metal is thinner than i expected but so far its holding up good and the glow in dark cover makes it not noisy. So definitely order another if i ever need one.
customer_reviews.author: Cottonbottom Farms

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👍
customer_reviews.text: I Have used this company before awesome and really always awesome very much love this company for what they put out will not go nowhere else for my pets ID informations tags, Thank you for doing a great job Much appreciated 👍😀
customer_reviews.author: TRJ532

customer_reviews.title: Silver tag is hard to read but okay product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love the silencer that comes with it but that covers up some of the lettering. Helps the noise from when they shake at 6 am. I got the red tag and silver tag. Silver tag is really hard to see because the laser engraving is silver. Wish it was black. Red one is fine. It’s fine for the money. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Franny

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet ID Tag
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the ID Tag for my Golder Retriever Charlie. It took about a week to arrive after it was shipped. Everything was engraved correctly on black anodized aluminum and looks sharp! The added glow in the dark edging is a plus too. If I ever need another Pet ID Tag I will definitely use GO Tags.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kaplan

product_meta.title: GoTags Personalized Pet ID Tags for Dogs and Cats, Includes Glow in The Dark Silencer to Protect Tag and Engraving, No Noise, Quiet Tags, Front and Backside Engraving
product_meta.description:
Pattern Name:Bone Tag with SilencerOur personalized pet tags are made and shipped from the USA in 1-2 business days after an order is placed. Our shop is in Washington state.

Permanently laser engraved with 2-sided engraving and up to 8 lines of personalized text. Comes with glow in the dark tag silencer to eliminate noise and protect finish and engraving, extending the life of the tag. With 4 lines on both front and back, there is plenty of room for all of your pet's important information. Our aluminum tags go through an anodized process that adds strength, durability, and brightness of color to each tag. Clear, sharp and easy to read personalization. Split ring included.

English alphabet characters only.
feature_bullets: Premium quality anodized aluminum pet ID tags for dogs and cats. To see all our pet ID products, click on our brand name GOTAGS above the product listing title.
Comes with glow in the dark tag silencer to eliminate noise and protect finish and engraving, extending the life of the tag.
Customize your tag with 2-sided engraving and up to 8 lines of personalized text with 4 lines on front and 4 lines on back
CHOOSE TAG SHAPE: Bone, Round, Heart, or Rectangle; CHOOSE TAG COLOR: Blue, Black, Red, Purple, Green, Gold, Pink, and Silver
TO ORDER: select tag shape from the above choices. After selecting shape, click CUSTOMIZE NOW to choose your color and add your personalization details to the tag.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
